c74object.name: el.oscil~
c74object.description: el.oscil~ is an oscillator with many of your favorite waveforms. You can request a waveform by name or with a series of partial weightings, starting with the DC component. Changing the waveform will result in gradual interpolation from one waveform to the next.

objarg.name: table length
objarg.description: Size of internal wavetable. Default is 8192.

objarg.name: waveform
objarg.description: Initial waveform. The choices are: "sine", "triangle", "square", "sawtooth" or "buzz". Default is "sine".

objarg.name: harmonic count
objarg.description: The number of harmonics for band-limited waveforms. Default is 10.

method.name: amph
method.description: Specify a waveform in terms of amplitude and phase of each partial. The first value is the weighting of DC. This has no phase of course. Following this are an arbitrary number of pairs of amplitude followed by phase.

method.name: buzz
method.description: Set the wave to be a band-limited pulsewave.

method.name: fadetime
method.description: Set the fade time. This is how long it will take to fade from the current waveform to the next, when the waveform changes.

method.name: fadetype
method.description:
Set the fade type for waveform interpolation with an integer. The codes are:
0: no fade
1: linear fade
2: power fade

method.name: harmcount
method.description: Set the maximum number of harmonics.

method.name: interpolate
method.description: When set, the oscillator will interpolate, resulting in a cleaner signal. This toggle is off by default.

method.name: list
method.description: Directly specify the weighting of each partial, starting with DC. Each partial will be mixed in sine phase. The weighings will be normalized so that the resulting waveform as a peak-to-peak amplitude of 1.0.

method.name: sawtooth
method.description: Set the current waveform to sawtooth.

method.name: sine
method.description: Set the current waveform to sine.

method.name: square
method.description: Set the current waveform to square.

method.name: triangle
method.description: Set the current waveform to triangle.
